channel.title: GPS Fix Inconsistency Issue
channel.description: Hello, I have a Carloop with the GPS module. At times it gets a fix very quickly when there is open sky at other times it never gets a fix. The question I have is would it be possible to program the Carloop to retry the gps connection until a fix is obtained? Thanks!

item.title: GPS Fix Inconsistency Issue
item.dc:creator: jnbankston
item.description:
Hello,
I have a Carloop with the GPS module. At times it gets a fix very quickly when there is open sky at other times it never gets a fix. The question I have is would it be possible to program the Carloop to retry the gps connection until a fix is obtained?
Thanks!

Read full topic
